website_summaries.verdict: Armed with an Nvidia G-Sync module and a 144Hz panel, the AOC G2460PG monitor offers solid gaming performance and a handful of user-friendly features.

customer_reviews.title: unusual resolution options) however it is a great monitor and a bargain with it's incredible refresh rates ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the newer model by the same name - it doesn't feature certain elements you may have seen reviewed elsewhere (crosshair overlay, unusual resolution options) however it is a great monitor and a bargain with it's incredible refresh rates and g-sync. It came with a non-uk power cable, which has a sturdy adaptor fixed in place - a small niggle but it hasn't impacted me at all. Excellent monitor overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase! Using this as my main monitor, I can see compared to my second monitor how smooth this thing is! Games running as low as 40fps seem like they are running at a stable 60! Glad I managed to grab this on sale as well! I fully recommend this product! The colour isn't anything amazing and its still only 1080p, but for the price i can't complain at all!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Carlyle

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but praise for this monitor! Getting full 144 fps on all games that support it, the gsync works perfectly, with the added bonus that I can turn off vsync in the actual games to free up resources, height adjustment is a nice feature, and grear colour! The only problem I had, and at no fault of the monitor, is thathat my specific gpu, GTX 980, requires a mini display port and I had to buy that separate. Overall amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Evan White

customer_reviews.title: 144hz is fantastic too, with a clear difference
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it for G-Sync alone. 144hz is fantastic too, with a clear difference. As it is a TN panel, the colours aren't going to be as good as an IPS, but that only really becomes a problem at odd viewing angles and not really noticeable from day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 144hz and G-Sync are a revelation. 144hz in particular, there's no going back.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent G-sync monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a solid 1080p g-sync monitor and it has defininately delivered that. Have had absolutely no problems installing / compatibility with my graphics card (gtx-980 strix). Would definately reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Gyles Bates

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable stand is awful, and the monitor was broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lampard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture worked straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Came a couple of days late .customer service team got it sorted quickly no fuss as soon as turned it on and played a game on it the late delivery was soon forgot. . Amazing picture worked straight out of the box ...very happy
customer_reviews.author: alan staples

customer_reviews.title: So happy I spent the money for it
customer_reviews.text: So happy I spent the money for it! I am really impressed with just how great the quality is from the actual production and quality of the resolution and graphics, the G-Sync technology even granted me around 10-20 fps more than my other monitor. You just need to make sure your graphics card is G-Sync compatible. I then Upgraded my PC with the Gigabyte Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB graphics card and I have to say the combination of the two make every thing look so superbly stunning. Would not think twice about recommending this product to anyway, great item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitors -> I like the fact that they are super clean design. The only issue is I do not know how much is the transfer delay as there is not information.
customer_reviews.author: Ivaylo Boicov Ivanchev

customer_reviews.title: Great performance, but it indeed has washed out colours
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, but it indeed has washed out colours, just like every other TN panel. I had every type of monitors used for various purposes, and I'd rather pick a gaming monitor with 1ms, 144hz and G-sync than anything else for gaming. You have plenty of features if you managed to swallow down the poor colours.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Benke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Using this monitor on my Ryzen 1800x & MSI 1080 GTX Armor OC. This monitor works incredibly well and hasn't skipped a beat yet!
customer_reviews.author: Detrucci

customer_reviews.title: If your frame rate drops from 100 to 40 there is no stuttering like v-sync, just smoothness
customer_reviews.text: G-sync has to be tried to be believed. If your frame rate drops from 100 to 40 there is no stuttering like v-sync, just smoothness. Games look pre-rended and awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Funtime

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, G-sync is excellent and works flawlessly but the quality of the TN panel is just meh. Leaves a lot to be desired unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Bauten Petros
